sink.methodName: public void forwardRequestUrl(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)

findings.description:
The user can send a URL over a request parameter which is then redirected by the servlet. The URL value is not sanitized before used.

curl http://localhost:8080/home?url=http://iamevil.com/
